mapper.select: SELECT setl_item_cd AS setlItemCd , efct_fns_dt AS efctFnsDt , efct_st_dt AS efctStDt , cretr_id AS cretrId , cret_pgm_id AS cretPgmId , cret_dt AS cretDt , amdr_id AS amdrId , amd_pgm_id AS amdPgmId , amd_dt AS amdDt , setl_item_nm AS setlItemNm , setl_type_cd AS setlTypeCd , setl_sperd AS setlSpred , vat_yn AS vatYn , dtl_cret_yn AS dtlCretYn FROM setl_item_info
